import React, { useRef } from 'react'; import { motion, useInView } from 'framer-motion'; import './Features.css'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faBowlFood, faTruck, faCalendarCheck, faClock } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; const Features = () => { // Create refs for each feature section const ref1 = useRef(null); const ref2 = useRef(null); const ref3 = useRef(null); const ref4 = useRef(null); // Track if sections are in view const isInView1 = useInView(ref1, { once: true, amount: 0.3 }); const isInView2 = useInView(ref2, { once: true, amount: 0.3 }); const isInView3 = useInView(ref3, { once: true, amount: 0.3 }); const isInView4 = useInView(ref4, { once: true, amount: 0.3 }); return (
{/* Background texture overlay */}

Our Food Philosophy

Homely, fresh, delivered to your doorstep with passion and care.

{/* Feature sections with enhanced design */}
{/* Feature 1 - Enhanced Design */}

Meals and Supermeals

Enjoy a perfectly balanced selection of meals throughout the day. From nutritionally dense Supermeals to satisfying Easy Meals, we have your day covered with delicious options that keep you energized and focused.

Fresh ingredients Balanced nutrition Energy boosting

Focus on your life and work while we take care of your meals

{/* Feature 2 - Enhanced Design */}

Meals arrive right when you need them

Punctual Free Delivery

Your meals arrive at your doorstep right on time, always fresh and ready to enjoy. We've eliminated delivery charges completely, regardless of your order size. Our dedicated delivery team ensures your food arrives in perfect condition.

Zero delivery fees On-time guarantee Perfect condition
{/* Feature 3 - Enhanced Design */}

Flexible Subscription

Choose the days of the week you need food - weekdays, everyday, or specific days. You can also change your delivery location between home and office as needed. Our subscription is designed to adapt to your lifestyle, providing ultimate CONVENIENCE.

Cancel anytime Customizable plans Location flexibility

Weekdays, everyday, or specific days - it's up to you

{/* Feature 4 - Enhanced Design */}

Prepared by passionate chefs with food engineering

Freshly Prepared Meals

Every meal is prepared with healthy, fresh ingredients by our passionate chefs who understand food engineering. No artificial additives, just wholesome nutrition that supports your lifestyle by reducing meal prep time, eliminating kitchen cleanup, and providing the ultimate CONVENIENCE you deserve.

Fresh ingredients No preservatives Chef crafted
); }; export default Features;
